title: Pvp.net Parcher Kernel laucnher problem
body:
Hello everyone,

First I'm french so sorry for the fault.
Last Week I launch League of Legend OCE, I play ...
Today I try to launch my launcher but a window spawn and say : Pvp.net Parcher Kernel has stopped working .
I try everithing, I re-download LoL OCE, administrator launch, ...
Please help me ...

Thank you, Ranked Sheep.

replies.body:
What OS are you on? Who's your ISP?

OS: Operating system, eg. Windows, Mac, etc.
ISP: Internet Service Provider, eg. Telstra, Optus, Vodafone, Internode, etc.
